feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: SAP Fiori Apps
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community

I trying to use the new SAP Fiori apps "Export Master Data - Business Partners (New) F6551A and  Import Master Data - Business Partners (New)  F6553A to move business partner data across some tenants.

What I did was to:

  • Selected the relevant business partner and exported all related tables to an XML file.

  • Then I unlocked the file in Excel to enable me edit it.

  • Thereafter, I tried to import this modified XML file into a different tenant.

However, when I initiate the import process, it gets stuck with the status "Importing file." Additionally, the imported file intermittently flickers disappearing and reappearing in the UI continuously without progressing.

My question:
Is this a known error or system bug, or have I potentially missed a required step in the export and import process for these apps?

Any advice or clarification from those who have successfully used these apps would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you!

Best 

Jack

entry.title: Delivery error- wrong recipient address
entry.content:
Hello Expert team,

We are configuring the Purchase Order Entry app in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition, to enable automatic email delivery of purchase order reports to our suppliers. The supplier‚Äôs email address is maintained via their contact person‚Äôs record.

However, when a contact person leaves the organization and their email remains in our records, any attempt to send reports to that address will not generate an obvious error. The system continues to show the purchase order status as ‚ÄúSent‚Äù and the Monitor Email Transmissions app reflects the status as ‚Äúsucceeded.‚Äù This means we don‚Äôt receive a Non-Delivery Receipt or alert if an email address is no longer valid.

What options or best practices are available to proactively detect and manage cases where outbound purchase order emails do not actually reach the intended recipient, especially if the contact information is outdated?

Thank you for your feedback.

Best

Jack

entry.title: Display of Opening Movement from balance carryforward in DRC AR_JOURNAL_LEDGER
entry.content:
Hello SAP Support,

We are implementing SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition, and have encountered the following situation:

The balance carryforward does not generate an FI document; instead, it posts the opening balances in Period 0 (ACDOCA). From an accounting perspective this is acceptable, but the customer requires that the legal Journal of Argentine (Libro Diario) reflects the ‚Äúopening / balance reclassification‚Äù movement resulting from the carryforward.

Question:
Is there a standard way for DRC object AR_JOURNAL_LEDGER to display this opening movement?

If this is not supported, what best practice or recommended alternative would you suggest to meet the legal Journal requirement? The key issue is that, since the carryforward in Public Edition does not create an FI document, AR_JOURNAL_LEDGER‚Äîbeing document-based‚Äîdoes not show the opening movement.

We would greatly appreciate your guidance on whether this requirement can be met with standard content, or alternatively the recommended approach to ensure compliance.

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards,

entry.title: Pallet Stacking and Bin Sequence ‚Äì WM Limitations vs EWM in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear all,

In my current project, I am exploring a couple of Warehouse Management functions in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition that I would like some clarification on:

  1. Pallet stacking

    • When creating storage bins, I noticed that certain fields‚Äîsuch as Maximum Handling Units (HU) per bin‚Äîare greyed out and cannot be edited.

    • From my research, it seems these features are only available with Extended Warehouse Management (EWM). Can you please confirm if this is correct?

  2. Bin sequence for putaway

    • Does the putaway sequence in Warehouse Management (WM) rely purely on bin capacity, maximum volume, or maximum weight?

    • I have not found clear SAP documentation that explains this in detail. Or is this functionality also tied to EWM?

For clarity, I have attached a reference screenshot highlighting the greyed-out sections in the storage bin master.

üëâ When replying, please mention which point (1 or 2) you are addressing, so that it‚Äôs easier for me and other readers to follow.

BR  

Faisal Maayeh

Can't able to compare more than three selectable quotations, can anyone explain is there any alternate solution for this or why system isn't allowing to compare more than three quotations ?

entry.title: managing Pallets in S4 hana public cloud
entry.content:
Dear All,

I  Have a case now where to pallets in my warehouse need to maintained, as each pallet the comes with a serial number which indicate in which bin or area it is  this serial number usually comes from the original supplier how could i add those serial numbers as i have seen an app to create a serial number but from what i understood this is used to create a serial number for the product it self not the pallet how could i overcome this problem 

BR
Faisal Maayeh

entry.title: ACR ‚Äì Business Partner Email Recipient Not Pulled in Statutory Report Distribution
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

Good day!

I‚Äôm currently experiencing an issue in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition ‚Äì Advanced Compliance Reporting (ACR) and I‚Äôd like to ask if anyone here has encountered the same.

Issue Description:

When I run statutory reports (e.g., PH_WHT_BIR2307), the Business Partner‚Äôs maintained email address is not being pulled into the To or CC fields of the email recipient setup.

  • The Business Partner master data has the email address properly maintained.

  • However, the statutory reports are not auto populating the email recipients.

  • As a result, the reports are generated but are sent as print output instead of email.

Expected Behavior:

The system should automatically pull the maintained BP email address for the statutory report distribution.

Actual Behavior:

The To/CC fields remain empty, so no email is sent to the intended recipient.

What I‚Äôve Tried So Far (Based on SAP Support‚Äôs Suggestions):

  1. Checked Email ID and Validity:
    I found that the email ID was not maintained for the supplier (e.g., 1000058), and the address usage validity started on 09/10/2025.

    • Because of this, the email wasn‚Äôt available for the reporting task period 07/01/2025 ‚Äì 09/30/2025.

    • I updated the email and validity as suggested in the help portal:
      Enabling E-Mail Recipients and E-Mail Channel for Business Partner Correspondence | SAP Help Portal.

  2. Output Parameter Determination Adjustments:

    • Step: Channel ‚Üí Deleted the marked entry.

    • Step: Email Recipient ‚Üí

      • Deleted the marked entries.

      • Maintained CC and BCC email addresses as direct value inputs.

    • Followed guidance from Output Parameter Determination | SAP Help Portal.

  3. Updated the Receiver Role:
    SAP Support also advised updating the role from BP to T1 for PH_WHT_BIR2307 in the Output Parameter Determination ‚Üí Receiver step.

    • I applied this change and retested.

Current Result:

Despite these adjustments, the issue persists. The report output still goes to Print instead of being sent via email.

My Question:

Has anyone else experienced this issue in ACR where the Business Partner email isn‚Äôt pulled as the recipient for statutory report distribution?
Are there other configuration steps or prerequisites that I might be missing to make the system automatically pull the BP emails?

I‚Äôd really appreciate any insights or recommendations you could share.

Thank you in advance!

entry.title: how to generate valuation cashflow in mass SAP Public Cloud CLM
entry.content:
Hi Expert,

I have found an API to mass maintain valuation rule for CLM contract. May i know if there any mass tools to generate the valuation cashflow?

entry.title: Does SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Support OCR-based Invoice Document Capture Without Ariba Central?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I have a question regarding invoice processing capabilities in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud.

Does SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud have a built-in feature to scan and capture supplier invoices (PDF or paper format) using OCR technology and import them as documents into the system?

I'm aware that integrating with SAP Ariba Central Invoice Management is one option for this functionality. However, I'm wondering if this can be achieved using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud as a standalone solution, without requiring additional Ariba licensing.

Any insights or guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: Copying Material code to PO
entry.content:
Dear experts,

My client needs to copy more than 500 material code to Purchase order from Excel file in one shot, as of now we can paste only limited data's as how many field's showing in the item screen. Is there any alternate solution for this to paste as much as that material code we want ?

Best regards,

Dinesh U

entry.title: Reclass of non-open item GL Balances
entry.content:
Dear All,

We has some GLs with non-open Item management need to reclass to item management before update GL master data

while I run the BOT with SAP Build Project -  Proposed Reclassification of G/L Account Entries (5AK)

the selection entries as below

https://api.sap.com/sap/opu/odata/sap/API_OPLACCTGDOCITEMCUBE_SRV/A_OperationalAcctgDocItemCube?$inlinecount=allpages&$select=CompanyCode,GLAccount,FiscalYear,LedgerGroup,AccountingDocument,AccountingDocumentItem,AccountingDocumentType,AmountInTransactionCurrency,Reference2InDocumentHeader,DebitCreditCode,PostingDate,TransactionCurrency,ProfitCenter,CostCenter&$filter=CompanyCode eq 'XXXX' and (GLAccount eq 'xxxxxxxxxx') and PostingDate ge datetime'2024-10-01T00:00:00' and PostingDate le datetime'2025-09-28T23:59:59' and (LedgerGroup eq '' or LedgerGroup eq '0L') and (AccountingDocumentType eq 'SA')

compare the output result from above API and the output from the App "Display Line Items in General Ledger"

can you please help with the filter for API calls with have same result with App "Display Line Items in General Ledger"

please note my GL account is non-item management

Many thanks,

Patrick

entry.title: AI Demo Ideas for S/4HANA Public Cloud (2508 TDD) - Finance/Accounting Focus
entry.content:
Hi everyone,
I need some advice from the community.

Our customer's executive has requested an AI-focused demo using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud edition. The focus should be on Finance/Accounting or cross-functional processes.

Context: Environment: 2508 TDD system
Constraint: Cannot use other products like SAP Ariba Central Invoice Management
Target audience: C-level executives in food manufacturing/retail industry
My scope: Accounting/Finance modules

What I'm looking for:
An "AI-powered" or "next-generation" demo that:

Looks impressive and innovative
Doesn't require extensive setup (realistic prep time)
Can be demonstrated within standard S/4HANA Public Cloud capabilities
Preferably something other than Joule (looking for alternatives!)

Initial thoughts:

Predictive analytics for cash flow?
Intelligent automation in financial closing?
ML-based anomaly detection?

Has anyone successfully demonstrated similar scenarios? What worked well? Any tips on quick wins that showcase AI capabilities effectively?
Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud 2508 / Error during the Migration of notes with the Migration Object Customer
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

i have the following issue during the migration of texts in the migration object customer. My goal is to migrate texts for customers in a way, so that it is displayed in the notes section of the customer (compare screenshot). The Text should be of the type "accounting note" (Text-ID: 0002).


What i have done so far is, that i filled the fields for the general texts in the migration template. After that i had to edit the mapping in the migration cockpit. The predefined text object (table) seems to be KNA1 (general business partner data), but when i try to map the Text-ID 0002 i get the following error during the simulation: "Text-ID 0002 is invalid for Object KNA1". But when i go into the Business Partner i can add a note with the Text-ID 0002 without a problem.

For the Source Text-ID i used a place holder in the migration template, so "Buchhaltungsnotiz" = "Accounting note". 

After some research i found out, that the Text-IDs are predefined in the Public Cloud, so in my opinion this could only be a problem of a missing assingment between the Text object and the Text ID, but i cant find any customizing setting to change this for the Business Partner. I have only seen settings for the sales areas etc.

My question is, what is the correct Text-ID for this case when i want to migrate accounting notes into the notes section of the general data view of the customers and if it is 0002, what settings do i need to make so this is allowed during the migration.

Best regards 
Lukas

entry.title: aATP - Confirmation Strategies
entry.content:
Hello All 

We are a distribution business with multiple plants and a central DC plant. At present orders are placed with origination plants and then back orders go to the DC plant. The confirmation strategies setup are Gain and with a fall back variant of Improve. Our business approach is that orders from customers are treated equally and work on a first come first served strategy. How would others setup up the confirmation strategies based on our business needs? Should the redistribute strategy be used instead? Keen to hear what others are doing. 

Adam

However, in Manage Rentable Object app, under Measurement section, this Z001 still doesn't appear. Anyone can advise?

entry.title: The capacity required of production order decreases to 0 hour when we start production (receive tran
entry.content:
Hello,


When we start producing a production order and transactions have started (confirmation, good receipt), the required capacity drops to 0.000 hours. This can be seen in the planning tools we use like Capacity Scheduling Table or Manage Work Center Capacity

So, let's take an example. I'm creating a production order that should take 22 hours to produce. I have to start it at 1:00 a.m. and finish it at 11:00 p.m.

Before producing it, I clearly see the required capacity of 22 hours in my various tools. But as soon as I start producing, i.e., making transactions, the required capacity goes from 22 hours to 0.000 hours.

How can I ensure that this required capacity decreases according to the confirmed quantities?

Thank you

entry.title: Language translation for Statutory reports DRC in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello, 

how do you maintain languages for statutory reporting within DRC? Reports are generated in English, if I switch to the local language, only some fields if the reports are translated. Moreover, it seems it is translated by a bot. Where can I maintain correct translations for these statutory reports? Many thanks. I reward kudos
